opis: U Jadranovu, u ulici Vladimira Nazora 33, nalazi se kuća površine 450m2, na parceli površine 730m2. Kuća ima unutarnju površinu od 370m2 +  više terasa ukupne površine 135m2. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja, kata i potkrovlja. U prizemlju je 9 soba, 3 kuhinje, 7 kupaonica, 2 natkrivene terase i natkriveni prolaz.. Na katu je 7 soba, 3 kuhinje, 6 kupaonica, otvorena terasa, dvije natkrivene terase i loggia. Potkrovlje je u roh bau stanju i sastoji se od dnevnog boravka sa kuhinjom, sobe, kupaonice, natkrivene terase i spremišta. Nalazi se 5 minuta pješke od morske obale. Grijanje je na struju, ima septički jamu. Ulaz na parcelu je sa dvije strane i mogućnost parkinga za 5 automobila. Nekretnina je potpuno legalna i moguća je kupnja stambenim kreditom. In Jadranovo, at Vladimira Nazora Street 33, there is a house of 450m2, on a plot of 730m2. The house has an internal area of ​​370m2 + several terraces with a total area of ​​135m2. The house consists of ground floor, first floor and attic. On the ground floor there are 9 rooms, 3 kitchens, 7 bathrooms, 2 covered terraces and a covered passage. Upstairs there are 7 rooms, 3 kitchens, 6 bathrooms, an open terrace, two covered terraces and a loggia. The attic is in roh bau condition and consists of a living room with a kitchen, a bedroom, a bathroom, a covered terrace and a storage room. It is located 5 minutes on foot from the sea coast. The heating is electric, it has a septic tank. The entrance to the plot is from two sides and there is a possibility of parking for 5 cars. The property is completely legal and can be purchased with a home loan.
